name: Bombai Muttai (Candy Floss)
description: Crispy meringue balls, light and sweet
instructions: Add vinegar and cream of tartar
cultural_notes: Popular children's sweet, sold at fairs
description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු මෙරිංගු බෝල, සැහැල්ලු හා පැණිරස
description_tamil: மிருதுவான மெரிங்கு பந்துகள், ஒளி மற்றும் இனிப்பு
cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය ළමා රසකැවිලි, ප්‍රදර්ශනවල විකුණනු ලැබේ
